description: Nicola Jones, 60, from Needham Market, denies wounding with intent after the incident in Stowmarket.
title: Woman pleads not guilty following Stowmarket stabbing
title_page: Woman pleads not guilty following Stowmarket stabbing - BBC News
maintext:
A woman has pleaded not guilty to wounding with intent after a man was stabbed.
Nicola Jones, 60, of Freehold Road, Needham Market, Suffolk, appeared at Ipswich Crown Court on Tuesday.
Her son Simon Jones, 26, of the same address, faces the same charge as well as one of possession of a knife in a public place, but he was unable to enter pleas as the video link in court was not working.
Police were called to Leveret Gardens, Stowmarket, at 11:00 GMT on 2 February to reports that a man had been injured.
